title: Pizza with squash and rocket
ingredients: ['For the pizza dough', '2 level teaspoons active dried yeast', '330ml warm water', '2 tablespooons extra virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '75g wholemeal wheat flour', '450 to 500g plain flour', 'For the topping', '3 tablespooons olive oil, to taste', '300g red kuri squash, sliced', '350g ricotta cheese', 'salt and pepper', '4 to 5 garlic cloves, crushed', '4 to 4 slices prosciutto', '1 bunch rocket']
